title.rendered: TOZO T6 True Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth Headphones Touch Control Wireless Charging Case IPX8 Waterproof Stereo Earphones…

content.rendered:
Read more

Ergonomic Design

The form of T6 completely matches the curve of inside contour of ear.

With spherical comfortable silicone eartips, it will probably provide extra carrying stability and luxury when in use.

Whether you’ re working or leaping, the earbuds will keep in ear securely

Advanced Bluetooth 5.0 Technology

Support HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP. Provides in-call stereo sound.

Greatly enhance the transmission velocity and offering you with a low-latency listening expertise.

Stereo Sound Quality

TOZO acoustic specialists foucus on exact acoustic tuning and discover out the very best sound traits for human listening to sensitivity.

Accurately regulate each element to attain an ideal stability of bass, midrange and treble.

TOZO T6 present highly effective bass( lowest 18Hz), mellow midrange, and clear treble(as much as 20kHz). Reappearing each element of the music vividly.

Read more

Touch Control

Features with contact management sensors, TOZO T6 Headset can largely decrease the stress to your ears if you contact the panel for varied capabilities.

Tap as soon as on L/R panel to play/pause music and reply calls, double faucet to skip backward/ahead, triple faucet to get up Siri/Google Assistant, maintain to regulate the amount.

Both Earbuds and Charging Case are IPX8 Waterproof Protection

IPX8 Waterproof Nano-coating effectively protects the earbuds and charging case from the harm of the splash by sweat and raindrops.

Earbuds and case even may be washed by water and cleaning soap.

No want to fret if you put on it whereas working,snowboarding, and so on. (not for swimming)

Upgraded Faster Wireless Charging

Enjoy quick charging, to totally cost the rechargerable case solely 55 minutes through cable or lower than 2 hours through wi-fi charger.

Playtime lasts for over 6 hours from single cost and whole 30 hours with charging case.

The charging case is suitable with most of wi-fi chargers.

Note: Wireless charger not included.

Read more
